title: Open the Baldur's Gates! We Have an Xbox Series X!
description: The Besties have gathered at the digital tabletop to review Larian Studios’ recent launch in early access to Baldur's Gate 3! Plus, Chris gives an in-depth report on the Xbox Series X!
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
content:encoded: The Besties have gathered at the digital tabletop to review Larian Studios’ recent launch in early access to Baldur's Gate 3! Plus, Chris gives an in-depth report on the Xbox Series X!
